scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m 'update' && git push origin main
scripts.tag: node -e "const v=require('./package.json').version; require('child_process').execSync(`git tag -a v${v} -m 'Release v${v}'`, { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.tagpush: npm run tag:release && git push origin HEAD && git push origin --tags
scripts.FAST_DEV: git add . && git commit -m 'FAST_DEV' && node -e "const d=new Date(); const ts=`${d.getFullYear()}-${String(d.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0')}-${String(d.getDate()).padStart(2,'0')}-${String(d.getHours()).padStart(2,'0')}-${String(d.getMinutes()).padStart(2,'0')}`; require('child_process').execSync(`git tag dev-${ts}`, { stdio:'inherit' })" && git push origin HEAD:DEVELOPMENT_DEPLOYMENT && git push origin --tags
